name: Agentic Labs
headline: AI system design tools for dev teams
description:
Agentic Labs is making software design and architecture less painful by building AI into the process. Today, developers have no shortage of tools for instantly creating chunks of code, but designing the systems that integrate this code is the hardest and most manual part of software engineering.

Our first product is Glide, an AI-first editor purpose-built for writing technical design docs. It connects to your codebase and saves your engineering team time on triage, planning, and implementation of complex code changes.

founders.name: Maksim Ivanov, Founder
founders.description: Building self-assembling software. Previously at hedge funds and doing ML research

founders.name: Robert McKnight, Founder
founders.description: Worked on self-driving cars at Tesla and self-driving tractors at John Deere, with a detour to Bain for consulting after business school. Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) and Mechanical Engineering degrees from UC Berkeley and an MBA from Harvard Business School.

# Software documentationyou can talk to
Simplify Code Management 
and Problem-Solving with:
[Glide](https://agenticlabs.com/<#product>)
## Introducing Stanza
Make your code accessible
## Build a code knowledge base
Generate explanations at every level
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665ef68f29cd1484896afeb8/669f98974fee910a67bf8951_Lightning.png)
## **Generate docs lightning fast**
### Never deal with outdated documentation again
‍
  * Generate up-to-date documentation for your entire codebase in minutes
  * Explore project understanding at codebase, directory, or file level
  * Automatically create summaries of code changes


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665ef68f29cd1484896afeb8/665f02d377a84d79068b3b38_Lightning-1.png)
## Answer questions with AI
### Instantly deliver insights from across your codebase
‍
  * Easily handle specific, file-level questions or high-level architectural questions
  * Go in-depth by understanding the documentation behind each answer
  * Get suggestions on how to get started or potential improvements


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665ef68f29cd1484896afeb8/665f02d39a615948f5332b68_Lightning-4.png)
## Code hosting integrations
### Seamlessly connect with your preferred platform
‍
  * Integrate effortlessly with Github, Gitlab, and Bitbucket
  * Maintain version control for both your code and documentation
  * Keep docs secure with the same viewing permissions as your repo


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665ef68f29cd1484896afeb8/665f02d30fea657f6ea7e968_Lightning-5.png)
## Documentation provider integrations
### Publish and manage your docs where you need them
  * Export to popular documentation platforms like Confluence and Gitbook
  * Customize the look and feel to match your company's style
  * Change providers effortlessly


[Book a Call](https://agenticlabs.com/<https:/calendly.com/d/cqhk-27t-59w/glide-intro-call-15-mins>)
## We are Agentic Labs
### Our mission is to enable software systems to grow, adapt, and evolve.
We will get there by integrating AI into the development process with the engineer in the driver seat.

generated_description:
**Agentic Labs: Transforming Software Design with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in New York, Agentic Labs is on a mission to simplify the complex world of software design and architecture. The company’s focus is to integrate artificial intelligence into the development process, aiming to alleviate the challenges developers face when crafting systems that effectively incorporate individual code pieces. 

Their flagship product, **Glide**, is an AI-first editor designed specifically for writing technical design documents. It connects directly to your codebase, streamlining the process of triage, planning, and implementing complex changes. In a landscape where coding tools abound but system integration remains labor-intensive, Glide offers a refreshing approach by saving engineering teams valuable time and effort.

### Key Features of Glide:
- **Instant Documentation:** Automatically generate up-to-date documentation for your entire codebase in a matter of minutes, ensuring no more outdated docs.
- **AI-Driven Insights:** Quickly answer both specific file-level inquiries and high-level architectural questions, all while maintaining clarity in underlying documentation.
- **Seamless Integrations:** Connect smoothly with popular platforms like GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket, allowing for secure version control of both code and documentation.
- **Flexible Publishing:** Easily export documentation to platforms like Confluence or Gitbook, customizing the style to fit your company’s branding.

Agentic Labs is part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, gaining traction under the mentorship of notable investors, including Tom Blomfield. Despite its small team of just two employees, Agentic Labs is striving towards enabling software systems that can grow, adapt, and evolve—all while ensuring engineers remain in control of the process.

Looking ahead, the goal is clear: empower developer teams with AI tools that finally make software design less painful and more efficient. Curious to learn more or try out Glide? Check out [Agentic Labs](https://agenticlabs.com) for further insights and opportunities.
